prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with a stylish hat and a tough demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that embodies street style with vibrant colors and a confident stance.
Generate a unique Pokemon inspired by urban culture, featuring a mix of brown and yellow hues.
Make a Dark-type Pokemon with a playful design and a rebellious attitude.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like it stepped out of a gritty city, with a distinctive swagger.
Design a Pokemon with an edgy appearance, combining elements of fashion and toughness.
Show me a Pokemon that balances a cool look with an intimidating presence.
